comments.author: o48o
comments.body: All you need to see is this to rule it illegal afI really shouldn't dig deeper then that because that's all the red flags you need but here we go:Should i start by the fact they didn't bother to hire someone who is fluent in English language, because if that's not important i wonder what is. I mean seriously just chatgpt would produce better results.And so far i haven't seen ANY projects with picture of certificate that isn't a scam. It's pretty much guarantee of a scam:And this is so stupid guarantee that it made me spill my coffee, and i am not talking about spelling errors, anyone can see that scam is "Garanteed", it's like someone who made this was: "f*ck it, anything goes":But who cares, you can invent your own reality when you are a scammer.I am guessing they are not doing KYCs but if they are, they are going to sell them in black market so it's your own fault if you gave them anything.

comments.author: Danydee72
comments.created_time: February 02, 2023, 04:29:18 PMLast edit: February 02, 2023, 04:51:46 PM by Danydee72
comments.body: Quite apart from the fact that this site is a scam, if anyone in this world had a bot to double income in ten days, there will be no one else having anything of financial value anymore right after one single year using the bot. Even investing only 1$, the amount after one year would be higher than all money existing on this globe. A rough calculation (2^32) of course ignoring the fact the bot just can't work that way, but nevertheless ... So, why would someone with such capabilities put up a site like this? .... exactly.So one may neglect deficencies in elementary spelling, may even neglect the fact, people on this site are hiding their identity or the fact, somebody unknown uses anonymous payment methods to steal our money. But do never neglect: if something sounds to be too good to be true, hands off!

comments.author: Gladitorcomeback
comments.body: There is no details of any team member and I didn't found their Whitepaper. They offering 1% for 24 hours , 5% for 3 days and 100% for 10 days . There is no details how theirs bit work. They also claim guaranteed principal back which clearly show that it's nothing but just a oonzi scheme. Theirs maximum deposit is $90000 , I'f some one invest he will recieve 9000$ in 10 days. This is something very amazing. Trading results can go either way but they claiming only profit. I will recommend all to stay away from this ponzi scheme and also suggest OP to stop advertising it

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: So this project is about trading bots but can provide certainty of profit over time and also with different types of investments will provide different benefits based on the investment value this is nothing more than a HYIP = High Yield Investment Program and unfortunately an investment program like this is only profitable if there is who keep on investing but if there is no more then everything will collapse and it's a pity members will never know when it will collapse because this is purely a ponzi scheme and not a coin project so please be careful and never be tempted to touch even 1$ because they might choose a small investment to pay so people will think this is paying and entrust a larger fund.
